name: A-MS:R (WIP)
description:
Demo build.

Build up your meter by attacking and getting attacked. Unleash your powa when you have enough meter. Substitution jutsu can be used when you have enough meter and are being attacked.

Action - KB/M - Controller Xbox / PS

Light Attack - j - X / Square

Special/Substitution Jutsu - k - RB / R1

Jump/Advance Dialogue - Space - A / Cross

Sprint (Hold) - Left Shift - RT / R2
